hero.title: Save money and get it faster
hero.subtitle: Vendors and suppliers can lower transaction costs, lower financing costs, and move money faster.

autosections.title: Save on transactions
paragraphs: Munidollars charge lower fees for accepting them at stores than traditional money.
Thanks to a simpler design and a purely digital currency, accepting Munidollars is cheap, easy, and can be done on almost any device.

autosections.title: Move money faster
paragraphs: As a digital currency, Munidollars are easy to move around and settle.
Transactions are fast and automatic, so you don't have to worry about banks or payment processors taking their time or messing around with your money.
